author: jkuhnert
msg: Fixes TAPESTRY-399.  Setting setLocale(Locale) on AbstractEngine was having no effect in Redirects becuase locales are only persisted normally during a full new render..
Changed Infrastructure so it detects a locale setting and appropriately persists the changes automatically if necessary.
